p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Within a string, replace the first occurrence of a pattern by another string.
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
Returns a new string in which the *first* match of `pattern` has been replaced by `replacement`. Both `pattern` and `replacement` are strings.

Uses the `replace` JavaScript function: See: [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)
The string with the pattern replaced.
The string to use as a replacement.
